Author: TonyL#3577
Content: I wonder it might be a good idea to connect gatewaysCC as soon as it will be well tested: so people will able to deposit directly needed currency via gateway and there will be a tables for these currency tokens

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: You exchange KMD or BTC on KMD/BTC tokens and gamble with it - need KMDICE only for txfee

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Oh, but for it needed token bets support from dice2 or liquidity providing on KMDICE/BTCtoken KMDICE/KMDtoken tokenbid tokenask markets of assetCC

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: It would be great if new dice contract will able to do things like a show random number in range - with it we'll able to make guis for any casino game no matter is it bj, slot or craps. It'll give much more freedom than win/lose result

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Like a for blackjack implementation: you have an array with 52 cards - run RNG it choose one from 52, pop card from array, deal to player, run RNG for  51 left, it's choose one, pop it from array deal to player and so on

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: yes dice2 betting with tokens should be a requirement

Author: Alright#0419
Content: Can you reliably know when a notarization will happen? Could dealer just wait until it's about to happen and then reveal entropy?

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Can't dealer cheat instead of player in such case?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: no, hash of entropy is revealed right away

Author: Alright#0419
Content: if it doesn't match, dealer is obviously cheating

Author: Alright#0419
Content: I know it might not make much sense, just throwing out ideas here, but is there some way to get notarizations themselves to reveal entropy?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: so by the time entropy is revealed, it's notarized already

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it can be that we can just wait for notarization to payout bets

Author: Alright#0419
Content: Hmmm, not sure I understand

Author: Alright#0419
Content: if entropy is still revealed in a reorg-able block, won't the problem persist?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: even if the payout is after the notarization

Author: Alright#0419
Content: we need some way to make an unconfirmed tx immutable it seems, right?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: that is why entropy not revealed until after notarization

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so dicebet would include not the actual entropy, but hash of entropy

Author: Alright#0419
Content: Ah, I just realized how simple that is

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: after notarized both parties must reveal or forfeit

Author: Alright#0419
Content: just don't do dicefinish until the dicebet is notarized

Author: Alright#0419
Content: correct?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: but this delays things to the notarization, which is a lot longer than 2 seconds it is now

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: yes, the change that is immune to 51% (but slow) is dicebet uses hash of entropy, dicefinish needs both parties to reveal

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: a whole lot of work and loses the 2 second realtime feedback, which is pretty cool and addictive

Author: Alright#0419
Content: Can we change the frequency at which the chain notarizes?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: what is it currently?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i guess 10, if it was reduced to 3 then it will be faster, but still nothing compared to 2 seconds

Author: Alright#0419
Content: Yea :/

Author: Alright#0419
Content: I recall someone mentioning making unconfirmed txs immutable with channels, didn't read into it much though

Author: Alright#0419
Content: could that be of use? Maybe I misunderstood that entirely though

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: well the trick that works for channels is exactly the problem

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the secret that is revealed is still valid even after reorg

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: that is the fundamental problem

Author: Alright#0419
Content: freq 3 would make it even harder to time the reorgs, just saying

Author: Alright#0419
Content: a lot harder, I struggled to do it at current freq
